lines.text: You're going to kill your own wife?
She's no longer my wife... just another in a long line of bitches that betrayed me
You made some mistakes when we were together, but siding with him
AGAINST ME! WAS THE BIG ONE!
Don't even think about trying to understand me Matt. Andy tried... Andy died. Shame really we missed Andy at our wedding

[while fighting]
Oh Matt you're not helping me no one's gonna believe suicide by strangulation
